mapper.insert: insert into post (users_id, post_type_id, title, content) values (#{usersId}, #{postTypeId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update post set post_type_id = #{postTypeId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_time = systimestamp where post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: select * from post where post_id = #{postId} and post_type_id = #{postTypeId}
select * from post order by created_time desc
